Class AnnotationManager

java.lang.Object
  tr.edu.gsu.mataws.app.AnnotationManager

public class AnnotationManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class manages annotation process by interacting with annotator, statistics and output components.

Author:
Koray Mancuhan & Cihan Aksoy
